title: FDA faces brain drain as 4th director exits role
description: Another abrupt departure of a high ranking Food and Drug Administration (FDA) official is raising alarm about a brain drain that could mean new drugs take longer to reach the public. The stakes are enormous for both pharmaceutical companies spending huge sums…
